mapper.select: select g.goods_num, g.goods_name, o.orderlist_qty from goods g, member_order m , orderlist o where m.order_num = #{orderNum} and o.order_num = m.order_num and o.goods_num = g.goods_num
select * from goods where goods_name like '%'||#{goodsName}||'%'
SELECT * FROM GOODS g, RECIPE r WHERE g.GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum} AND g.GOODS_NUM = r.GOODS_NUM
select * from goods where category_num = #{categoryNum} order by goods_num
select * from goods order by goods_num
select g.goods_num, g.goods_name,g.goods_price, g.goods_image from goods g, wishlist w where w.member_num = #{memberNum} and g.goods_num = w.goods_num
mapper.insert: insert into goods (GOODS_NUM, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_CONTENT, GOODS_IMAGE, GOODS_KAL, STORE_NUM, CATEGORY_NUM, original_file) values (sequence_num.nextval, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsContent}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsKal}, '4', #{categoryNum}, #{originalFile})
